advancements.spectrum.break_decayed_bedr: Break decayed Bedrock by using a Netherite Spitzhacke
advancements.spectrum.break_budding_bloc: Break a Budding Block using a Resonance Tool
advancements.spectrum.break_infested_blo: Break an Infested Block using a Resonance Tool
advancements.spectrum.break_spawner_with: Break a Mob Spawner using a Resonance Tool
advancements.spectrum.build_advanced_ped: Add new blocks to your Structure to make use of your improved Sockel
advancements.spectrum.build_basic_pedest: To fully harness the powers of your improved Pigment Sockel you will need to build a structure that funnels the energy from gemstones to it
advancements.spectrum.build_complex_pede: Upgrade your Sockel structure another time fully harness it's magical powers
advancements.spectrum.carry_too_many_hea: Carry so much Scarlet with you that you are unable to jump
advancements.spectrum.carry_too_many_low: Carry so much Aerialite with you that you are taking flight
advancements.spectrum.catch_shooting_sta: Catch a shooting star right out of the sky
advancements.spectrum.collect_all_basic_: Collect all 12 kinds of colorful pigment
Mixing colors seemed so easy. But then brown had to ruin your fun. Literally impossible to mix using your current palette
Collect all types of naturally generating gemstones
advancements.spectrum.collect_azurite.de: Collect raw Azurite. It has to be refined before using
advancements.spectrum.collect_gemstone_p: Crafting in the Pigment Sockel requires gemstone powder. What is the most straightforward way to crush something?
advancements.spectrum.collect_grayscale_: Complete your Pigment collection by collecting the four grayscale Pigments
advancements.spectrum.collect_lightning_: Discover the source of Storm Stones
advancements.spectrum.collect_mermaids_g: What grows deep under the sea?
advancements.spectrum.collect_pigment.de: Break the leaves of a colored tree to get the pure pigment you so desired. The leaves release their precious harvest only when broken by you personally
advancements.spectrum.collect_scarlet.de: Retrieve Scarlet from the depth of the Nether
advancements.spectrum.collect_shooting_s: Find the remnants of a shooting star
advancements.spectrum.collect_sparklesto: You never noticed this ore before at all.... weird
advancements.spectrum.collect_vegetal.de: Feed it, lean back and watch it devour
advancements.spectrum.craft_bottle_of_fa: Time to tinker with your new, magical abilities. Create life! Or more like... microorganisms. Weak and slow. It's something. What do they eat?
Your first experiments were successful. But there has to be more...
advancements.spectrum.craft_bottle_of_ru: It looks like there is still more. Create world-devouring decay by infusing pure crystals with the power of the void
advancements.spectrum.craft_colored_pede: Upgrade your Pigment Sockel by using all your collected shards
advancements.spectrum.craft_colored_sapl: All around me are familiar aces
Use your magical abilities to craft a colored sapling
advancements.spectrum.craft_moonstone_pe: Use a Mondstein Splitter to upgrade your Pigment Sockel once more
advancements.spectrum.craft_onyx_pedesta: Use the Onyx Splitter to further upgrade your Pigment Sockel
advancements.spectrum.craft_something_br: The other side of the rainbow
Create something truly brown using Onyx Pulver in your improved Pigment Sockel
advancements.spectrum.craft_spawn_egg.de: Use the payoff of your experiments to revive an once-dead creature
advancements.spectrum.craft_using_pedest: Use your Pigment Sockel to craft an item using gemstone powder. It seems to react to redstone?
Use the Fusion Shrine to create a black shard in the darkest of nights
advancements.spectrum.dark_light_staff.d: Change the light level of one of Radiance Staffs lights to Zero by using the staff on it
advancements.spectrum.use_oblivion_picka: Cut through the world using an Oblivion Spitzhacke enchanted with Efficiency
advancements.spectrum.enter_dimension.de: Find out what lies beneath the bedrock floor
advancements.spectrum.fill_void_bundle.d: Completely fill up a Bottomless Bundle
advancements.spectrum.get_player_only_gl: Craft semi-permeable glass to protect your home from intruders
advancements.spectrum.place_pedestal.des: Craft your personal Pigment Sockel and place it down
advancements.spectrum.put_too_many_low_g: I must go, my planet needs me
Overload one of your animals with Aerialite. Bye bye
advancements.spectrum.get_ender_treasure: Some Endermen that appear in your world carry blocks with them that seem to radiate an eerie aura
advancements.spectrum.spectrum.title: Spectrum
advancements.spectrum.spectrum.descripti: A story about magic, colors and chaos
A story about a journeys end
advancements.spectrum.spectrum_midgame.d: A story about curiosity and greed
advancements.spectrum.use_all_pedestal_u: Place Upgrades on top of all four gemstone blocks of your Sockel Structure
advancements.spectrum.use_end_portal_cra: I like to move it, move it
Use an End Portal Cracker on an End Portal Frame and let destruction ensue
advancements.spectrum.craft_ominous_sapl: Let it grow, let it grow!
You're sure combining vegetal with a young sapling will yield something interesting
advancements.spectrum.use_spawn_egg_on_s: Use a spawn Egg on a Mob Spawner to change its type
advancements.spectrum.wear_complete_bedr: Wear a full suit of Bedrock Armor
advancements.spectrum.collect_ender_drag: Collect the Ender Dragons head using a weapon enchanted with Treasure Hunter
advancements.spectrum.collect_wither_hea: Collect a Wither Skull using a weapon enchanted with Treasure Hunter
advancements.spectrum.use_mob_egg_on_spa: Use a mob egg on a mob spawner to change its type
advancements.spectrum.enter_liquid_cryst: Touch refined gemstones in liquid form
advancements.spectrum.gift_wet_lava_spon: Throw a Wet Lava Sponge at another player
advancements.spectrum.get_hit_while_wear: Get hit while wearing a full suit of Edelsteinstone Armor
advancements.spectrum.collect_mob_head_u: Kill an enemy with a Treasure Hunter enchanted weapon and collect its head
advancements.spectrum.build_wither_using: Build a Wither using Wither Skulls
advancements.spectrum.fill_knowledge_gem: Fill a Knowledge Drop with 10.000 experience
advancements.spectrum.get_tool_with_iner: The fastest Pick in the West
Break 1000 identical blocks using an Inertia enchanted tool
advancements.spectrum.craft_energy_colle: Construct a collector powerful enough to harvest energy from gem geodes
advancements.spectrum.place_energy_colle: Place the collector in the center of a geode and watch it work
advancements.spectrum.finish_progression: Reach the end of your magical journey. Congratulations, Pigment Tinkerer!
advancements.spectrum.place_bottle_of_fa: It's WAY more powerful than your first experiment. It seems to destroy everything it touches after a while. Is there something sturdy enough to withstand its destructive potential?
advancements.spectrum.place_bottle_of_ru: There is no going back... (for now?)
